ResearchProjectDef.label: Production improving bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Learn how to create bionics that improve pawns productivity and speed in common life tasks.
Making these bionics will require at least an employable professional crafter to make them and a skilled professional doctor to install them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced production improving bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Learn how to create advanced bionics that improve pawns productivity and speed in common life tasks.
Making these bionics will require at least a master crafter to make them and a strong master doctor to install them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Combat improving bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description:

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced combat improving bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Learn how to create advanced bionics that improve pawns combat abilities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mind altering bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Learn how to create mind altering bionics that improve pawns abilties.
Making these bionics will require at least a region-known master crafter to make them and a region-known master doctor to install them.
